data.eml:eml: A new species of Namtokocoris Sites (Hemiptera: Naucoridae) from Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vitheepradit, Akekawat (2017): A new species of Namtokocoris Sites (Hemiptera: Naucoridae) from Thailand. Zootaxa 4320 (3): 592-596, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4320.3.11
